titleStmt.title: The life of that most illustrious prince, Charles V, late Duke of Lorrain and Bar, generalissimo of the imperial armies rendred into English from the copy lately printed at Vienna, written by a person of quality, and a great officer in the imperial army.
Vie de Charles V, duc de Lorraine et de Bar et généralissime des troupes impériales. English
titleStmt.author: Labrune, Jean de.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Edw. Jones, and published by Randal Taylor ...,

notesStmt.note: Translation of: Vie de Charles V, duc de Lorraine et de Bar et généralissime des troupes imperiales.
Attributed to Jean de La Brune. Cf. BM.
Reproduction of original in Yale University Library.
